comment.body: i'm back to just `d14na` now that I can properly manage `users.json`. not even sure what I did, but I'm glad I could help. just let me know if you need anything else

@leftside Yes! Encouraging people to download and use a Zeronet client directly is the ONLY way to grow the community. We have a similar message (as the one shown on 43110.cf) once we release our new proxy service. Although some of our plans were delayed last year, we are still no track to release several new services in the first quarter of '19. Check out our [github](https://github.com/d14na) for recent updates and activity.
